verbs.description: rumors of threat bring absences lockdown and anxious parents to new britain high school an apparently innocuous comment wednesday [ARG0: that] [V: alarmed] [ARG1: some new britain high school students] led police to investigate overnight they found no credible threat but the school went into lockdown thursday morning when a student told a classmate of bringing in a weapon for self defense abria principal damon pearce erin stewart facebook new britain alexis ware police chief james wardwell lockdown new britain police department sheldon mcdonald high school new britain high school officer superintendent nancy sarra
